item.title: Micron Shares Slide After Quarterly Outlook Misses Estimates

item.title: Supreme Court to Consider TikTok Ban
item.description: The court scheduled fast-track oral arguments for Jan. 10 on whether the law violates the First Amendment.

item.title: Smart Glasses Won Me Over, and This Is the Pair That Did It
item.description: Meta’s Ray-Bans and its prototype Orion hint at the future of smart glasses—sleek, stylish and truly wearable.
